cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP control port to an out-of-range value 99999 will cause F1-C interface connection failures and prevent F1AP control message exchange with the DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SRS enable flag to an invalid value of 99 will cause sounding reference signal configuration errors and prevent proper SRS transmission for uplink channel estimation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SRS 啟用旗標設定為無效值 99 會導致聲音參考訊號配置錯誤，並阻止上行鏈路通道估計的正確 SRS 傳輸。
